squidpony.squidgrid.util

Enum Direction3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<Direction3D>
      • squidpony.squidgrid.util.Direction3D
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Direction3D>

    @Beta
public enum Direction3D
extends java.lang.Enum<Direction3D>
    Represents the eight grid directions and the deltaX, deltaY, and deltaZ values associated with those directions. The grid referenced has x positive to the right and y positive downwards on screen with z positive out of the screen away from the viewer. Plus is away from the user in the z axis while Minus is towards the user. This class is in Beta status because not all rotation methods are fully functional.
    Author:
    Eben Howard - http://squidpony.com - howard@squidpony.com

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Direction3D[] CARDINALS
      An array which holds only the six cardinal directions.
      int deltaX
      The x coordinate difference for this direction.
      int deltaY
      The y coordinate difference for this direction.
      int deltaZ
      The z coordinate difference for this direction.
      static Direction3D[] DIAGONALS
      An array which holds only the twelve directions that are diagonal to two axis, but not the third.
      static Direction3D[] SUPER_DIAGONALS
      An array which holds only the eight angles which are diagonal to all axis.
